title: cybertheft
extract: Cybertheft refers to the act of using an internet to steal someone's property or to interfere with someone's use and enjoyment of property. In other words, cybertheft is the stealing of financial and/or personal information through the use of computers for making its fraudulent or other illegal use.
extract_html: Cybertheft refers to the act of using an internet to steal someone's property or to interfere with someone's use and enjoyment of property. In other words, cybertheft is the stealing of financial and/or personal information through the use of computers for making its fraudulent or other illegal use.
